content.rendered:
Software Developer | Tulsa, OK  
  • Presently seeking .Net Software Developer. This position is based in Tulsa, OK; this is a Full time position with our client. This position will allow the individual to work from home, but initially (and as needed) will require meeting face to face.
Requirements
  • Ruby
  • .net  3+(C#)
  • MS SQL Server
  • Team Foundation Server
  • Minimum 2 years .net development
  • Willing to work after hours occasionally
  • Can work independently and has self-motivation
  • Desire to learn and improve technical skills
  • Two or more of the following(ASP.net, WCF, WinForms or Windows Service)
Other Skills considered a Plus:
  • Linux
  • JavaScript/JQuery
Salary:
  • $60-$70K
